text: [Music]
the NHL is returning to Big City live
and fully animated in the cartoon world
of Disney Channel's big city greens
Cricket let last year's Victory get to
his head so Grandma Alice hopes to
Humble her grandson in this year's NHL
big city greens Classic this time Remy
Vasquez Nancy and Coach Cricket are
joining Sydney Crosby in the Pittsburgh
Penguins while Tilly Bill Gloria and
Coach Alice are teaming up with Brad
Marshon and the Boston Bruins it's a
very real game every goal save and check
that happens here will also happen in
big city it's live and unpredictable
with special in-game surprises Sid and
Cricket take on Marshon and Grandma
Alice March 9th at 3
p.m.
